English: The child goes out with a friend.
Dad goes to meet a friend.
The child is at a café.
The child goes out to the café.
The child comes home from the café.

Vietnamese: Con ở đây hay ở đó.
English: The child is here or there.

Vietnamese: Con đi ra ngoài hay ở nhà.
English: The child goes out or stays home.

Vietnamese: Con đang nói hay đang nghe.
English: The child is speaking or listening.
The child understands or doesn’t yet.
The child is going home, okay.

Vietnamese: Bây giờ con về nhà rồi.
English: Now the child has come home.

Vietnamese: Bây giờ mọi người về rồi.
